name: Board
desc: Represents the game board, including claimed tiles, frontier tiles, and player management.

name: claimFrontierTile
desc:
Claims a frontier tile, updates tiles and frontier sets,
and returns a map with the new frontier and newly claimed tile positions.

name: findChainsWithSum
desc: Finds all chains (paths of adjacent claimed tiles) whose values sum to targetSum.

name: frontier
desc: Gets all current frontier tiles.

name: getTileType
desc: Determines the type of a tile at a given point.

name: tiles
desc: Gets all currently claimed tiles.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: cell_component
desc: Represents a single cell in the game grid.

name: gridPosition
desc: The grid position of this cell.

name: isSelected
desc: Whether this cell is currently selected.

name: onTap
desc: Callback when this cell is tapped.

name: type
desc: The type of this cell (e.g., claimed, frontier).

name: value
desc: The value displayed in this cell (if any).

name: cell_manager
desc: Provides management for cell components within an infinite matrix world.

name: CellManager
desc: Manages the lifecycle and state of CellComponents in the game world.

name: CellManager.new
desc: Creates a CellManager for the given world.

name: addCellComponent
desc: Adds a CellComponent at the given gridPos with the specified type.

name: cellComponents
desc: All cell components managed by this instance, keyed by their grid position.

name: clearAllCellComponents
desc: Removes all cell components from the world and clears the map.

name: handleTileTap
desc: Handles a tap event on a cell at tappedGridPosition.

name: initializeBoardView
desc: Initializes the board view by adding cell components for all frontier and claimed tiles.

name: selectCell
desc: Selects the cell at tappedGridPosition.

name: selectedCellPosition
desc: The currently selected cell's grid position, or null if none is selected.

name: updateCellComponent
desc: Updates the CellComponent at gridPos to newType, or adds it if missing.

name: world
desc: The infinite matrix world where cell components are placed.

name: InfinityNumberMatrixGameWithRouter
desc: The main game class for Infinity Number Matrix.

name: backgroundColor
desc: Returns the background color for the game.

name: onLoad
desc: Loads overlays and initializes the router.

name: playerScoreNotifier
desc: Notifies listeners of the player's score changes.

name: router
desc: The router component for managing navigation between screens.

name: inf_matrix_world
desc: A world representing the infinite number matrix game board.

name: InfMatrixWorld.new
desc: Creates an InfMatrixWorld.

name: attemptClaimTile
desc: Attempts to claim a tile with the given number.

name: board
desc: The logical board for the game.

name: cellManager
desc: Manages cell components within this world.

name: onLoad
desc: Loads the board, cell manager, and player, and sets up overlays.

name: startZoom
desc: The initial zoom level for the world view.

name: LoadingScene
desc: A simple loading scene to show while the game is initializing.

name: onLoad
desc: Late initialization method for Component.

name: main
desc: The entry point of the application.

name: MainMenuScreen
desc: The main menu screen for the game.

name: onLoad
desc: Loads the main menu and adds menu buttons as children.

name: onOptions
desc: Callback when the options button is pressed.

name: onStart
desc: Callback when the start button is pressed.

name: NumSelectorComponent
desc: A horizontal row of number buttons (0-9) for number selection in the game.

name: NumSelectorComponent.new
desc: Creates a NumSelectorComponent with customizable appearance and callback.

name: borderRadius
desc: The border radius for button corners.

name: buttonSize
desc: The size (width and height) of each button.

name: fontSize
desc: The font size for the number text.

name: onLoad
desc: Loads the number selector and adds number buttons as children.

name: onNumberSelected
desc: Called when a number button is selected.

name: spacing
desc: The horizontal spacing between buttons.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: Player
desc: Represents a player in the game.

name: Player.new
desc: Creates a Player with the given name, score, and remainingPoints.

name: calculateScoreFromChains
desc: Calculates the score based on unique cells in chains.

name: makeMove
desc: Attempts to make a move by spending points.

name: name
desc: The name of the player.

name: remainingPoints
desc: The number of points the player can still spend.

name: score
desc: The current score of the player.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: updateScore
desc: Adds points to the player's score.

name: onLoad
desc: Late initialization method for Component.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.
